Levels.CSplus: a visual stimulus that might be followed by an aversive electrical stimulus
Levels.CSminus: a visual stimulus that will never be followed by an aversive electrical stimulus
Levels.US: brief aversive electrical stimulation applied to the palm of the left hand

trial_index.Description: Index of the trial presented (trials can contai either just one CS, or one CS and one US)

reinforced.Description: indicated wether a CS presentation was followed by a US presentation

Levels.0: not reinforced, i.e., the CS presentation is not followed by a US presentation
Levels.1: reinforced, i.e., the CS presentation is followd by a US presentation

stim_file.Description: Relative path of the stimulus image file

Levels.images/diamond.png: a black on gray image of a diamond shape
Levels.images/square.png: a black on gray image of a square shape, i.e., the diamond shape tilted by 45 degrees
